Articles.Content:
I cover the entire hill with concrete, including any secret entrances/exits/escape hatches/mikeman7918s etc. I then cover the hill in granite.

My granite hill.

I break a dam, flooding the top of the granite hill. It eventually erodes. I use my h20-removing-device to remove the water there.

My hill.

I Sparta-kick you off the top of the hill.

My hill.

I eat the hill

My hill

Time reset to April 2012, and the hill is in its original state.

Then I buried several mines on the hill and left the hill.

No one's hill.

(OOC: Also, before you blindly post who you think had owned the hill (when in fact that person didn't) read carefully.)

I'll just walk over to this abandoned hill an- *BOOM*

Damn mines!

No ones hill, because I died.

I send the hill to a dimension of teletubbies

My hill

I rode on a helicopter and drilled the hill with nitroglycerin, then packed them lightly with dirt, and left the hill.

No one's explosive hill.

*Crawls back to hill, after miraculously surviving*

Must... get... back... wait a moment.

*throws a rock at hill*

*gigantic explosion*

Well, no one's hill, because there is no hill.

For reason unknown, the dirt landed back to form the hill.

No one's hill, because I wasn't even there! (Stuck in SF Bay Area isn't fun, you know!)

Having had enough of this nonsense, I locate Designer225, drag him to my new neutronium hill, and drop him on it, where he is pinned in place by thousands of times the normal gravity. Also, several other nearby hills fall apart under the gravitational loads, and the debris flies over to the neutronium hill and then buries Designer225.

Designer225's deadly grav-trap hill.

Designer225 catches pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis and dies, and I eat the gravity trapped hill

My hill

I appeared the next day as if nothing had happened. Time also resets to April 2012 (STOP eating the hill!) as a result of the previous destruction of the hill.

No one's hill.

I walk on the hill, trip, hit a secret button, causing everything to fast forward 11 months, and the 7 days of terror destroy this thread.

What hill?

The big bang happens again, and I am the conqueror of the bang hill.

My hill.

I arrive in the new Universe in an inter-dimensional escape pod and I crash land right on top of ToTheMun.

My hill.

I send mikeman7918 to a dimension of teletubbies never to be seen from again.

#Myhill

I fire a railgun at you.

My hill.

I fire you from a railgun.

My hill.

I set you lose.. .. in space.

My hill.

I tell Danny2462 your exact location.

My hill.

I drop a nuke on the hill, set to ground burst mode.

No one's (radioactive, non-existent) hill.
Time resets. No one's hill.

I emerge from my nuke and time reset proof bunker and Take over the hill.

My hill.

I steal your nuke and time proof bunker and install a rocket on it and fly to the hill and land on you.

My hill with a nuke and time proof bunker on it.
